introduction.title: Your Health, Function and Confidence—All Under One Roof
introduction.content:
When your joints, tissues, skin, hair and confidence begin to change, you deserve more than temporary fixes. You deserve an aesthetic and regenerative clinic that understands your symptoms, listens carefully to your concerns and offers real, long-lasting medical solutions.

Dr SNA Clinic is an advanced medical, regenerative and aesthetic clinic located on London's prestigious Wimpole Street, within the Harley Street medical district.

As both a regenerative clinic and an aesthetic clinic, we bring medicine, aesthetics and regenerative science together under one roof - helping you heal, repair and rejuvenate both internally and externally.
highlights: Advanced regenerative treatments for repair, healing and healthy ageing
Doctor-led aesthetic treatments for natural, balanced enhancement
Evidence-based wellness programmes to improve mobility, comfort and quality of life

questions.question: What makes Dr SNA Clinic different from a standard aesthetic or beauty clinic?
questions.answer:
Dr SNA Clinic is a medically led aesthetic and regenerative clinic, not a high-street beauty salon. All treatments are designed and overseen by a UK-trained doctor with more than 20 years of clinical experience, including trauma & orthopaedics, regenerative medicine and aesthetic medicine.

We focus on:
- long-term health, function and confidence
- evidence-based regenerative treatments
- natural, doctor-led facial aesthetics
- skin, hair, joint and tissue health — not just looks

This medical foundation allows us to treat more complex concerns safely, ethically and effectively.

questions.question: What conditions and concerns do you treat?
questions.answer:
We support patients with a wide range of aesthetic and medical concerns, including:
- skin ageing & facial rejuvenation
- hair thinning and hair loss
- joint pain & soft-tissue inflammation
- tendon injuries and degenerative issues
- metabolic and body contour concerns
- natural, doctor-led facial enhancement

If you're unsure whether your concern fits, your consultation will give you clear, honest guidance.

questions.question: Is regenerative treatment at Dr SNA Clinic safe and evidence-based?
questions.answer:
Yes. All regenerative treatments are:
- based on current scientific evidence
- performed by a GMC-registered doctor
- supported by extensive training in Trauma & Orthopaedics and regenerative medicine
- delivered in a CQC-regulated medical clinic

We explain benefits, risks and alternatives clearly so you can make a confident, informed decision.

questions.question: Who performs the treatments?
questions.answer:
All assessments and key treatments are performed by Dr Syed Nadeem Abbas or clinicians working directly under his medical supervision.

Dr SNA:
- has 20+ years clinical experience
- has worked in Cambridge & Oxford hospitals
- holds a Distinction Masters in Aesthetic Plastic Surgery
- is a Member of the Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh
- is trained by the American Cellular Medical Association

Your care is always medically led, not delegated to unregulated providers.

questions.question: What happens during my first consultation?
questions.answer:
Your consultation is structured, calm and medically focused. It includes:
- detailed discussion of your symptoms, concerns and goals
- aesthetic and/or regenerative medical assessment
- explanation of treatment options and expected outcomes
- time to ask questions without pressure
- advice on the safest and most effective path

We build your treatment plan together — never rushed, never forced.

questions.question: Do you combine regenerative and aesthetic treatments?
questions.answer:
Yes — and this is one of our clinic's greatest strengths. When appropriate, we integrate:
- regenerative medicine (PRP, collagen stimulation, polynucleotides)
- advanced aesthetic treatments
- wellness and metabolic support

This joined-up approach helps you feel better, function better and look naturally refreshed at the same time.

questions.question: Is there downtime after treatment?
questions.answer:
Most of our treatments have minimal or no downtime, especially:
- PRP
- polynucleotide injections
- skin regeneration therapies
- non-surgical facial enhancement
- scalp and hair restoration treatments

During your consultation, we explain recovery expectations clearly.

questions.question: Do you treat men and women?
questions.answer:
Yes. We treat men and women of all ages, with tailored protocols for:
- skin
- hair
- joints
- wellness
- facial aesthetics

Every plan is personalised.

questions.question: Are your treatments suitable for sensitive or mature skin?
questions.answer:
Absolutely. Because our approach is medical and regenerative, we can safely support:
- sensitive skin
- mature skin
- post-procedure skin
- thinning hair
- age-related joint or tissue changes

Your safety and suitability are always assessed first.
